SQL.LOAD: SELECT code, parent_category_id, tab_id, dict_item_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, form_category_id FROM elp_form_category WHERE form_category_id = :form_category_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select fc.Form_Category_id, fc.code, Tr.TRANSLATION Description, t.Tab_id, Trt.TRANSLATION Tab_Name, nvl(Form_Count,0)Form_Count From elp_form_category fc inner join elp_tab t on fc.tab_id = t.tab_id inner join ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION tr on tr.DICT_ITEM_ID = fc.DICT_ITEM_ID inner join ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION trt on trt.DICT_ITEM_ID = t.DICT_ITEM_ID AND tr.LANGUAGE_ID = trt.LANGUAGE_ID left outer join (SELECT Form_Category_id, COUNT(*)Form_Count FROM ELP_FORM GROUP BY Form_Category_id)a on a.Form_Category_id= fc.Form_Category_id where tr.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.LOAD_CATEGORY_ALL: select fc.Form_Category_id, fc.code, Tr.TRANSLATION Description, t.CODE Tab_Code, Trt.TRANSLATION Tab_Name From elp_form_category fc inner join elp_tab t on fc.tab_id = t.tab_id inner join ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION tr on tr.DICT_ITEM_ID = fc.DICT_ITEM_ID inner join ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION trt on trt.DICT_ITEM_ID = t.DICT_ITEM_ID AND tr.LANGUAGE_ID = trt.LANGUAGE_ID where tr.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id ORDER BY TAB_CODE, DESCRIPTION
SQL.LOAD_TAB_LIST: select t.Tab_id, Trt.TRANSLATION Tab_DESC, t.CODE Tab_Code From elp_tab t inner join ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION trt on trt.DICT_ITEM_ID = t.DICT_ITEM_ID where trt.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id Order by Tab_DESC
SQL.LOAD_FORM_LIST: select f.Form_ID, ft.TRANSLATION Form_Name, tt.TRANSLATION Tab_Name, fc.form_category_id , fct.TRANSLATION Form_Category_Name, t.Code Tab_Code From elp_form f inner join elp_tab t on f.tab_id = t.tab_id inner join ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION ft on ft.DICT_ITEM_ID = f.DICT_ITEM_ID inner join ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION tt on tt.DICT_ITEM_ID = t.DICT_ITEM_ID AND ft.LANGUAGE_ID = tt.LANGUAGE_ID left outer join elp_form_category fc on f.form_category_id = fc.form_category_id left outer join ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION fct on fct.DICT_ITEM_ID = fc.DICT_ITEM_ID AND fct.LANGUAGE_ID = tt.LANGUAGE_ID where ft.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id --dynamic_where_clause order by Tab_Name, Form_Category_Name, Form_Name

UPDATE_FORM_FORM_CATEGORY.AssignToFormCategory: update ELP_FORM set FORM_CATEGORY_ID = :form_category_id where FORM_ID = :form_id
UPDATE_FORM_FORM_CATEGORY.RemoveFromFormCategory: update ELP_FORM set FORM_CATEGORY_ID = null where FORM_ID = :form_id

SQL.UPDATE_FROM_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION: update ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION set TRANSLATION = :translation where DICT_ITEM_ID = :dict_item_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_form_category SET code = :code, parent_category_id = :parent_category_id, tab_id = :tab_id, dict_item_id = :dict_item_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE form_category_id = :form_category_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_form_category ( code, parent_category_id, tab_id, dict_item_id, created_by, form_category_id ) VALUES ( :code, :parent_category_id, :tab_id, :dict_item_id, :created_by, :form_category_id )
